import { Component, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course-card', templateUrl: './course-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course-card.component.scss'] }) export class CourseCardComponent { @Input() editable!: boolean; @Output() title!: string; description!: string; creationDate!: Date; duration!: number; authors!: string[]; }
